snippet: A study, conducted for Citigroup by the Economist Intelligence Unit, ranked 120 cities on their competitiveness, based on their ability to attract investments, workers and tourists, among other attributes.
abstract: A study, conducted for Citigroup by the Economist Intelligence Unit, ranked 120 cities on their competitiveness, based on their ability to attract investments, workers and tourists, among other attributes.

headline.main: A Study Makes It Official: New York Is the Most Competitive City
